comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: "Navvy" - en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Navvy I wonder what they were working on there - the railway?

comment.author: 47572660@N08
comment._content: Yes, beachcomberaustralia! I remember when my mum used to take us kids to Sydney from The Gong on the train, there would almost always be gangs working on the tracks. Mum used to toss out newspaper out the window for them. You definitely couldn't do that now; well, maybe with the older carriages......

comment.author: 47572660@N08
comment._content: Sorry, I should have said that they were usually in the vicinity of the Royal National Park.
